title: [GAMEPLAY] Nautilus anchor disappears in flight
body:
For the past month or so while playing bot lane I've noticed Nautilus' anchor has been disappearing when he throws it an enemy. Everything is normal until the hook leaves his hand, then it disappears until it reaches it's destination or strikes a target. The disappearing makes it impossible to judge the actual path. 

1. Play against Nautilus.
2. Watch Nautilus throw his anchor and make it disappear.
3. Hope that it doesn't appear attached to your champion.  

This has been happening over multiple patches and with multiple different skins.

replies.body:
Hey, thanks for the report! I haven't personally seen this in my games, and it's not something I'm currently able to repro. Have you tried running a client repair to see if there's a jumbled file somewhere, causing the anchor to become invisible?

* Open the League of Legends Launcher.
* Click the Gear button to open the Settings menu.
* Click the "Repair" button. The repair process will take about 30-60 minutes.
FYI, it's actually the question mark button, not the gear button.
